thread.title: No visa ban on Pakistanis by Kuwait, says Ambassador
thread.title_full: No visa ban on Pakistanis by Kuwait, says Ambassador

title: No visa ban on Pakistanis by Kuwait, says Ambassador
text:
No visa ban on Pakistanis by Kuwait, says Ambassador | 0 0 
KARACHI: Pakistan`s ambassador in Kuwait on Wednesday said that Kuwait hasn’t placed any visa ban on Pakistani nationals. 
Ghulam Dastagir said that news on social media about the ban baseless, further adding that same news had sprung up in 2011. 
Earlier, a newspaper claimed that Kuwait has banned nationals from Syria, Iraq, Iran, Pakistan and Afghanistan. It claimed that the ban included on tourism, visit and trade visas as well as visas sponsored by spouses. 
They attributed the blanket visa ban to the “difficult security conditions in five countries” 0 0 No visa ban on Pakistanis by Kuwait, says Ambassador was posted in world of Geo TV - https://www.geo.tv on February 02, 2017 and was last updated on February 02, 2017. This news story is related to World, World News, International News, International, Geo News, Latest World News.
